label: 鎮西探題
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The two Kamakura deputies for Kyushu, established in the 1290's with full powers of jurisdiction over that island. Exercised much greater authority than the Chinzei bugyō. Held by members of the Hōjō house.　[鎮西奉行]
